Hi Joel/Rica, Thank you for the update. Our client that is on this journal has requested some of the following amendments, can this be done on the journal? Original pdf I have sent also had this, please let me know if you can properly view the links on the pdf.
  • Add website link in the first paragraph:
  • By Mr & Mrs Elias https://mrandmrselias.com.au/
  • When Mr & Mrs Elias https://mrandmrselias.com.au/ were engaged to completely transform the layout and functionality of this 20-year-old Maroubra …
  • Update their description in the second paragraph to include "design and construct": As a boutique, family-run design and construct firm specialising in architectural apartment living, they take …
  • Add a link to our contact page in the last paragraph: Thinking about downsizing or renovating your apartment? Mr & Mrs Elias can bring your vision to life. https://sydneyrenovationshire.com.au/contact/

full_threads.body:
Hi Tien,

I’ve uploaded the content to the Journal, but the images appear to be low resolution. Could you please send us the featured image and the rest of the images separately? It would be best to provide the highest resolution available for better quality.

Thanks in advance!
